      • errorFormat

        public static boolean errorFormat(javax.swing.JComponent jComponent,
                                  java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Adds a red border and an errorMessage to the jComponent
        Parameters:
        jComponent - The component where a red border and the errorMessage will be added
        errorMessage - The error message to display
        Returns:
        false because the method is called when something is wrong
        See Also:
        JComponent.setBorder(Border), JComponent.setToolTipText(String)

      • normalFormat

        public static boolean normalFormat(javax.swing.JComponent jComponent)
        Adds a black border to the jComponent, and removes an error message if it has one
        Parameters:
        jComponent - The component where a red border and the errorMessage will be added
        Returns:
        true because the method is called when something is right
        See Also:
        JComponent.setBorder(Border), JComponent.setToolTipText(String)
